markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stonegate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1406) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 42 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Stonewalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress. You gain [_passwall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=216) as a 7th-level divine innate spell that you can cast once per day. Unlike the spell, however, this ability can be used only to open passages through barriers of earth or stone.
name: Stonegate

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Stonegate Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 42 2.0 Prerequisites Stonewalker --- Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress. You gain passwall as a 7th-level divine innate spell that you can cast once per day. Unlike the spell, however, this ability can be used only to open passages through barriers of earth or stone.
